remarks: A Dirichlet character is determined by its values on the unit group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrresb.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrresb.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrresb.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrresb.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchrresb.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrresb.Y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. D ) $.
dchrresb $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X |` U ) = ( Y |` U ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
